endpoints.description: Retrieve current outage data across the utility network.
Submit a report of a potential issue or outage detected by users.
Fetch the operational status of a specific IoT sensor.
Update the calibration parameters for sensors in the network.
Access a summarized dashboard view of network performance metrics.
Register for notifications about service status changes and outages.
View statistics on energy produced from renewable sources.
Modify customer contact preferences for outage alerts.
List past incidents and associated resolutions within the network.
Initiate a simulated outage drill for preparedness analysis.
